data.Name: Accelerator
data.Description: A chemical that speeds up the rate of a reaction, especially in cement.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Acid crosslinker
data.Description: An acid that promotes a connection between polymer resin chains.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Acid emulsifier
data.Description: An acid that encourages the suspension of one liquid in another.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Acid gelling
data.Description: An acid that increases the viscosity of a liquid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Acid inhibitor
data.Description: An acid that slows a reaction between a reactive fluid and a material.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Activator
data.Description: A substance that starts or accelerates a chemical reaction.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Anionic surfactant
data.Description: A chemical that modifies the surface tension of a liquid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Anti gelation
data.Description: A substance that prevents or retards the formation of a gel.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Antistatic
data.Description: A substance that reduces or eliminates the buildup of static electricity.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Antifoam
data.Description: A material that destabilizes a foam.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Antifreeze
data.Description: A material that lowers the freezing point of a liquid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Anti-gas migration
data.Description: A material that prevents the movement of gas during the setting of cement.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Anti-gelling
data.Description: A material that stabilizes the viscosity of a liquid by preventing the formation of a gel.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Anti-settling
data.Description: A substance that prevents or retards the gravity separation of a solid from a liquid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Antisludging
data.Description: A surfactant used to prevent the formation of sludge, an emulsion very high in solids.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Biocide
data.Description: A chemical or treatment that kills bacteria.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Blended surfactant
data.Description: A combination of additives to change the surface tension of a liquid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Bond accelerator
data.Description: A substance that reduces the reaction time for materials to bond together, especially in cement.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Bonding agent
data.Description: A substance that induces materials to bond together, especially in cement.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Breaker activator
data.Description: A substance that stimulates the breakdown of the structure of a gel.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Cationic surfactant
data.Description: A substance with a positive charge that changes the surface tension of a liquid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Chelant
data.Description: A substance that prevents or slows the precipitation of iron. In the oil field, chelating agents are used in stimulation treatments and for cleaning surface facilities.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Chemical tracer
data.Description: A substance used to track the flow path of a fluid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Clay dispersant
data.Description: A substance that aids in breaking up a mass of clay particles.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Clay stabilizer
data.Description: A substance to inhibit the movement or swelling of clay minerals.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Conductivity enhancer
data.Description: A substance to increase the conductivity of fractures in the reservoir.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Corrosion inhibitor
data.Description: A substance to prevent or slow down the reaction of a metal with a fluid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Crosslinker
data.Description: A substance to increase the viscosity of a polymer gel.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Defoamer
data.Description: A chemical that reduces the stability of the bubble skin in a foam and cause the foam to break.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Demulsifier
data.Description: A substance that causes the separation of oil from water.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Diagnostic tracer
data.Description: A substance added to a fluid to enable the remote detection of the fluid location or flow path.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Dispersant
data.Description: A substance that aids in breaking up a mass of particles, bubbles or droplets.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Diverting agent
data.Description: A material that forces acid to enter another zone by having a higher viscosity or building a filter cake.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Emulsifier
data.Description: A substance that creates or stabilizes an emulsion.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Encap breaker
data.Description: A substance in pill form that stays with the polymer and helps break the mud cake.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Energizer
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Expansive additive
data.Description: developed to reduce and compensate the hydraulic shrinkage of cement
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Extender
data.Description: A substance that decreasing the density of a cement slurry.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Fines suspender
data.Description: A chemical that keeps fine particles in suspension in a liquid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Flow enhancer
data.Description: A substance that improves the rate of flow of a liquid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Fluid loss
data.Description: A substance that reduces the transfer of drilling fluid into the rock.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Foaming agent
data.Description: A substance that encourages an emulsion, being the suspension of a gas in a liquid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Formation sealer
data.Description: A substance that improves the ability of a fluid to close a formation zone, thereby preventing lost circulation or improving zone abandonment.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Free Water Control
data.Description: An additive to the cement slurry to address the potential problem of particle sedimentation.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Friction reducer
data.Description: Dispersants, also known as friction reducers, are used extensively in cement slurries to improve the rheological properties that relate to the flow behavior of the slurry
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Gas hydrate control
data.Description: A substance to reduce or prevent the occurrence of gas hydrates in a flow line.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Gas migration
data.Description: Primarily used as an additive in a cement slurry
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Gel stabilizer
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Gellant
data.Description: A substance that increases the viscosity of a liquid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Hydrogen sulphide Scavenger
data.Description: A material that takes H2S out of solution or the flow stream.

data.Name: Iron control
data.Description: A chemical that control the precipitation of iron from solution.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Lightweight
data.Description: A substance that decreasing the density of a cement slurry.

data.Name: Liquid extender
data.Description: A substance that decreasing the density of a liquid.

data.Name: Lost circulation
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Lubricant

data.Name: Mixing Fluid
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Mothball
data.Description: Is this about naphthalene balls or "mothballing" as in preserving equipment for future reactivation?

data.Name: Nonemulsified iron control
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Non-emulsifier
data.Description: A surfactant to inhibit the emulsion tendency of a treatment fluid with residual oil in the formation.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Nonionic surfactant
data.Description: A chemical that modifies the surface tension of a liquid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Odorizer
data.Description: A substance that imparts an odor to natural gas.

data.Name: Oxidizer
data.Description: A water treatment reactant to oxidize or release oxygen.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Oxygen scavenger
data.Description: A chemical to remove dissolved oxygen from water-flow streams.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: pH buffer
data.Description: A substance to keep the pH of a liquid within the desired range.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Preflush
data.Description: A substance to dissolve carbonate or to displace and isolate incompatible formation fluids.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Proppant transport
data.Description: A proppant transport additive is used to adjust the viscosity or other property of the transport fluid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Radioactive tracer
data.Description: A radioactive substance added to a fluid to enable the remote detection of the fluid location or flow path.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Resin activator
data.Description: A catalyst for setting resin.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Retarder
data.Description: A chemical that slows a reaction, such as the set time of cement.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Scale inhibitor
data.Description: A substance that prevents the formation of iron scale.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Set enhancer
data.Description: A substance that encourages the setting of cement.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Spacer
data.Description: In the context of pumping, a spacer is a fluid used between two fluids to prevent contamination.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Stabilizer
data.Description: A chemical or physical effect that prevents separation of two or more, normally immiscible phases.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Sulfide inhibitor
data.Description: A chemical that reduces or prevents the formation of iron sulfide scale.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Surfactant
data.Description: A chemical that modifies the surface tension of a liquid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Suspending agent
data.Description: A surfactant used in acid-treating solutions and fracturing fluids to suspend insoluble fines.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Temperature stabilizer
data.Description: A substance that reduces the degradation of polymers at higher thermal conditions. It stabilizes the polymer not the temperature.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Tensile strength adjustor
data.Description: A substance to increase the tensile strength of a fluid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Thixotropic
data.Description: A substance that changes the thixotropic property of a fluid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Viscosifier
data.Description: A substance that increases the viscosity of a fluid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Wax inhibitor
data.Description: A chemical that prevents wax from being deposited in pipes.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Weighting agent
data.Description: A substance that increases the density of a fluid.
